trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_SEQ_00<tab>Jude appears very determined.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_TODO_00<tab>Search for Jeromere.

TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_TODO_01<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize a set of writing utensils <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Deliver the set of writing utensils <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to the cocksure student)) /var>.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Jeromere.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Jeromere once more.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Jude.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_001<tab>Last we met, I mentioned there was something I needed to confirm before proceeding. This something concerned Jeromere.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_002<tab>Since joining the Studium, I have not had the chance to have a proper discussion with him.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_003<tab>There is so much I would like to ask him, such as why he refuses to speak of our vow from ten years ago or why he insists so fervently that I drop my studies.

TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_004<tab>For the longest time I was too scared to confront him. I thought if he had truly lost interest in astronomy maybe we wouldn't have anything in common anymore, and...
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_005<tab>Never mind. That's no longer relevant. Thanks to you and our starlens journey, I've become confident enough to face my fears head-on.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_006<tab>I plan to meet Jeromere and ask him what happened to the promise we made at the exact spot where we encountered the Azure Star in Tranquility.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_007<tab>But I'm positive that if I ask him to come, Jeromere will find another clever excuse to avoid me.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_008<tab>Please, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, would you be so kind as to ask him in my stead?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_009<tab>Thank you! You can likely find him at Auk's Landing reciting poetry with his friends.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_010<tab>In the meantime, I will make my way to Tranquility and wait for you and Jeromere there.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_000_050<tab>You there! You're the crafts<var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> helping out at the Faculty of Astronomy. I take it you're not here to recite poetry?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_000_051<tab>You're looking for Jeromere? Sure, I can point you in his direction but you have to do something for me first.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_000_052<tab>You see, there is this girl. She spurned my advances a few days ago...
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_000_053<tab>Hm, I can see you are also flabbergasted to learn she rejected a dashing young man such as myself!
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_A1_000_001<tab>So what do you need me to do?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_A1_000_002<tab>Hurry up and tell me what you want already.

TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_000_055<tab>Aren't we snappy? Well, I know just the thing that will elevate me from simply charming to outstanding─a set of classy writing utensils! I want you to craft them for me.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_100_055<tab>I will, of course, see that you are furnished with everything you need. After all, such consideration is the defining quality of a gentleman!
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_000_056<tab>Just ask this boy right next to me for materials. He still owes me a rather large sum of gold and will see that all your expenses are covered.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_SURROUNDINGS04143_000_057<tab>Let's hurry and get this over with. I cannot stand being indebted to him for a moment longer!
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_SURROUNDINGS04143_000_060<tab>Hm? Who are you? What do you want from us?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_000_100<tab>Once you finish crafting me my utensils, you can deliver them directly to me.

TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_000_101<tab>Excellent! With this exquisite set, I will no doubt be able to produce poetry beyond that of the average club member! She will have no choice but rethink her foolish decision!
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_000_102<tab>Ah, right. You wanted to know where Jeromere is. You can find him at Scholar's Harbor right about this time.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_SURROUNDINGS04143_000_103<tab>A real wet blanket, this one is, if you ask me.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_000_104<tab>No need to say that. He's only just joined and has yet to settle in, is all.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_SURROUNDINGS04143_000_105<tab>What faculty did he transfer over from again?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_000_106<tab>He is certainly not going to be happy if I told you. You're going to have to ask someone else.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_SURROUNDINGS04143_000_107<tab>Hm... Sounds to me like he's harboring a few secrets, then.

TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_000_108<tab>Yes, yes, the utensils you crafted are superb. Rather than dallying about admiring your handiwork, however, you'd best hurry to Scholar's Harbor if you want to catch Jeromere.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_SURROUNDINGS04143_000_110<tab>Let me know if you need any more materials. <sigh> I should've found a way to return him his gil sooner...
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_SURROUNDINGS04143_000_111<tab>Well, at the very least, I've managed to avoid bankruptcy...
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_150<tab>Oh! It's you─the crafts<var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> working with Jude. What can I do for you?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_A2_000_001<tab>I want to talk to you about Jude.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_A2_000_002<tab>I need to speak with you.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_152<tab>You want to speak with me regarding Jude...?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_153<tab>Very well. I suppose I can spare a few moments if it concerns our dear friend Jude.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_154<tab>Shall we talk here, or did you wish to speak in private elsewhere?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_155<tab>Tranquility? I'll be on my way, then.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_COOLMALE04143_000_160<tab>Do not worry! They are in good hands. Now, I suggest you hurry. Jeromere isn't going to be at Scholar's Harbor for much longer.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_SURROUNDINGS04143_000_165<tab>The mystery grows deeper. I wonder what happened to Jeromere at his previous faculty...?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_200<tab>So what exactly did you wish to speak with me about?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_201<tab>I see... I suspected as much.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_202<tab>Of course I should've known you'd be suspicious. You have always been two steps ahead of me.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_203<tab>Even so, you still came. And I have words for you that have been left unsaid for far too long.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_204<tab>Jeromere, why did you quit the Faculty of Astronomy?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_205<tab>So you know I once presided there...
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_206<tab>It would be odd if I didn't. Surely, even you knew you wouldn't be able to feign ignorance for long. I ask you again: why did you quit the Faculty of Astronomy?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_207<tab>I...
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_208<tab>Ten years ago we made a vow at this very spot. We swore together we'd search for and find the Azure Star together!
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_209<tab>Why would you renege on our promise now? Have you come to hate astronomy?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_210<tab>Me? Hate astronomy? Ha! Please do not be silly. Finding that star meant the world to me.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_211<tab><sigh> You will also be forced to face the truth one day, just as I have. Allow me to warn you before it is too late.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_212<tab>I am but one summer older than you. I shed blood, sweat, and tears to ensure I'd be able to earn a place to study at the Studium.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_213<tab>I kept silent about which faculty I was to enter because I had hoped to make some progress toward our goals and surprise you with it once you joined.

TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_214<tab>Upon hearing members were free to use the telescope any time, I joined the Classical Astronomical Association. I planned to devote all my spare time to our investigation.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_215<tab>For several months, day in and day out, I took that telescope and observed every last corner of the sky without fail.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_216<tab>To my utter despair, I was unsuccessful in ever locating the Azure Star.

TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_100_216<tab>Even so, I refused to give up on our dream. I thought perhaps a more powerful telescope was required, and so after much negotiating with my professors, I was granted leave to use the finest equipment available in the Studium.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_200_216<tab>Yet for all my effort, all my planning...I could find not so much as a glimmer of that bloody star in the night sky.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_217<tab>I grew more weary by the day and was eventually forced to come to a harrowing realization...
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_218<tab>The Azure Star does not exist. It never did. Just as the scholars at the Studium told us back then, we imagined it.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_219<tab>The Azure Star...doesn't exist?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_220<tab>If...If, in fact, what you say is true, then why not tell me sooner?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_221<tab>Same as me, finding that star meant everything to you. How could I possibly tell you that...
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_222<tab>If the Azure Star doesn't exist, then what have I been working towards this entire time...?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_223<tab>I understand your feelings better than you know. Forgetting about it will take time, but it can be done.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JEROMERE_000_224<tab>Promise me, however, you won't forget this, Jude: I am and always will be your friend and ally.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_225<tab>My life─without the Azure Star giving me direction and purpose─is meaningless. What am I to do...?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_A3_000_001<tab>What do you <var 1A 02 /var>want<var 1A 01 /var> to do?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_A3_000_002<tab>You're the only one who can give your life purpose.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_227<tab>Yes. You're absolutely right. Letting someone or something determine my life's path is the easy way out. I'm the only one that can decide what's right for me.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_228<tab>Let's return to Makers' Meet. There is something I would like to investigate.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_250<tab>If even Jeromere was unable to find it, there is a good chance the Azure Star truly does not exist...
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_251<tab>There is, however, one other possibility. There is the chance it is out there, just not observable with the tools that were at his disposal.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_252<tab>The journey we're about to embark upon is about as dark and uncertain as a flight through a starless night sky.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_253<tab>Regardless, I shall not give up. This is a dream I've pursued for a decade. I cannot walk away without a fight.

TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_254<tab>Alone, I would have no hope of continuing Jeromere's work, but with you by my side perhaps I can accomplish that which even he has not! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, may I count on your continued assistance?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_A4_000_001<tab>I will see you through your adventure.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_A4_000_002<tab>Well, I can't leave you to your own devices, can I?
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_256<tab>I knew I could count on you! Thank you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Once I have everything sorted, let us begin production posthaste!
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_JUDE_000_257<tab><var 08 E905 ((Her)) ((His)) /var> continued encouragement has really lit a fire in my heart. I feel as fierce as a bomb!
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_SYSTEM_000_258<tab>The next quest will be available from Jude upon reaching level 88 as a carpenter, leatherworker, or weaver.
TEXT_AKTKLA205_04143_SYSTEM_000_260<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
